thread.title: Daniel Millpointer

author: Daniel Millpointer
title: Daniel Millpointer
text:
Thank you Very much, my stress is finally gone. Thank you again -
Your company is super efficient and very nice, through. I'm not a world traveler and there is a lot to deal with. My original passport renewal was stolen from
my mail. Panic set in and the US state dept. did me right as well. Recieived my passport 5 days before a trip to India. Now i can go.
Highly recommend your company. Sincere thanks; Dan Millpointer
